channel.title: CodersRus Coding Community
channel.description:
Pwnd - www.orlyhosting.com says: I host you. Of course you're approved
CodersRus is a new coding community. We have everything from RuneScape private servers - C++ , we will be adding more and more topics for coding. Our site is hosted 24/7 by Pwnd from Moparscape/Moparisthebest. [url=http://www.codersrus.org][img]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/1049/codersrusdh9.gif[/img][/url] Here our goal is to keep a nice clean community that can let everything learn different Computer Languages. We have very nice staff, and well thought out Forum Awards. Don't wait to get yours! We allow anything to be posted in the Tutorials Section, so don't be afraid to help. We welcome all new people in advance. Thank you, Adam www.codersrus.org - Main Site www.codersrus.org/smf - Forums http://www.codersrus.org/smf/index.php?action=register - Forum Registration Thank you, Mod Adam

item.title: CodersRus Coding Community
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Pwnd - www.orlyhosting.com says: I host you. Of course you're approved

CodersRus is a new coding community. We have everything from RuneScape private servers - C++ , we will be adding more and more topics for coding.

Our site is hosted 24/7 by Pwnd from Moparscape/Moparisthebest.

Here our goal is to keep a nice clean community that can let everything learn different Computer Languages. We have very nice staff, and well thought out Forum Awards. Don’t wait to get yours! We allow anything to be posted in the Tutorials Section, so don’t be afraid to help.

We welcome all new people in advance.

Thank you,
Adam

www.codersrus.org - Main Site

www.codersrus.org/smf - Forums

http://www.codersrus.org/smf/index.php?action=register - Forum Registration

Thank you,
Mod Adam
